frontMatter.title: Start Learning Linux in Minutes
frontMatter.summary: Welcome to this exclusive edition of TecMint, this course module is designed for those newbies in Linux, Linux Administrator, Windows Administrator, who wants to do the best of Linux capabilities in IT organizations.
